description:
A company stole my voice using AI. I called them out, and they responded.

Some of the things I mentioned in this video:

  - My original video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UMofZIT9FcQ
  - Blog post with more info: https://www.jeffgeerling.com/blog/2024/elecrow-responded-apologized-ai-voice-cloning
  - Tom's Hardware article: https://www.tomshardware.com/tech-industry/artificial-intelligence/ai-takes-youtubers-voice-alleged-offending-videos-have-now-been-unlisted
  - Resemble AI: https://www.resemble.ai
  - ElevenLabs AI Text-to-Speach: https://elevenlabs.io
  - YouTube's policies for AI identity protection: https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/2801895

Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/geerlingguy
Sponsor me on GitHub: https://github.com/sponsors/geerlingguy
Merch: https://www.redshirtjeff.com
2nd Channel: https://www.youtube.com/@GeerlingEngineering
3rd Channel: https://www.youtube.com/@Level2Jeff

Contents:

00:00 - What happened?
01:11 - Do not let the sun go
title: The dark side of AI voice cloning (Elecrow responds)
